111.content:
Alex was a fairly attractive guy. He had a bright smile, blue eyes and dark hair and he was in his early 20s. Ladies would swoon over him, wine and dine him, with just a heated glance in their direction. Gay guys would give him flirtatious winks and sometimes more.

At least until it came to the bedroom.

When he pulled down his pants, the ladies would point and laugh. The men would for the most part do the same. For once he longed to dominate in the bedroom. He even fantasized about growing not only his penis, but also his entire body.

He was embarrassed at the size of his penis... It was small. And it was genetic. No amount of weight lifting and exercise was going to do anything to change it. He felt humiliated by it. He had a gorgeous body and a generally nice personality, until it came down to home base.

That is until...
111.title: Alex the to-be God

choices: Alex asks for a certain scenario
1111.content:
One morning, as he watched a porn video on Internet Alex felt his clothes getting tighter. "Am I growing?" he thought. This was his fantasy so this made him even more aroused, and the growth sped up. Standing up, his clothes ripped as he reached 2.20 meters in height. "Holy fuck, I can't believe this is happening!" he said, bumping the ceiling and starting to grow even faster. But the growth suddenly stopped.

"Hold back for a moment, Alex" a female voice said behind him. He turned around and saw a beautiful young woman in a tunic.
"Who are you?"
"My name is Ralnisa and I am an omnipotent goddess willing to fulfill your fantasies. You always wished to become a giant and have a larger penis, am I wrong?" Amazed, Alex just nodded. "Then I'm going to make you grow every time you are aroused. I can fix any harm you cause and modify everyone's memories so you can go overboard."
"Seriously? That's amazing. Why would you do that for me?"
"This is my fetish too" she replied bluntly. "Well. are you ready?"
"Sure I am" Alex replied, feeling his erect penis growing bigger.
1111.title: A goddess in your room

1112.content:
It was an odd thought that overcame him, but he was thinking about ordering something off the internet.

Alex would search for some ingredients that would alleviate him of such terrible pains, the humiliation, and the ridicule that he had garnered since he started dating. A few clicks, a few transfer sequences, and a few pressings of the "ENTER" button later, all Alex had to do now wait for his delivery.

He checked up online daily to see the status of his delivery, until 4 days later, a crude box, stock full of the ingredients he searched for, came right a his door. He opened up the crude box, searched its contents, and found out that all of his ingredients were there... all except one. In its place, he seemed to have found what seemed to be a piece of paper with something scribbled in blue ink pen.

The following read:

"Dear Customer,

We regret to inform you that the following ingredient you have been requested for has been rendered out of stock recently. We will inform you when we have more of the requested ingredient in stock, thank you and have a nice day."

"Huh... well - that's a bummer, oh well, I've got a lot of what I requested for anyway, so no biggie."

Little did Alex realize that by implying the term "no biggie" he failed to understand that the ingredient that wasn't in the delivery, was a supposed limiter for without it, he would gain what he wished for... plus MUCH MORE. There was little time to spare however, for Alex was eager to play around and fiddle with the chemical components he bought.

The ingredients were "All natural" and quite scenting indeed. A few spits of this, a dash of that, some mixing, some waiting, and before he knew it, an entire 5 hours would have gone and passed by. His fruits were worth it however, as the resulting blue concoction was the growth remedy to all of his ailments. Alex was more than prepared to take the plunge, limiter or not. He downed the entire potion, making certain that nothing remained, and tore up any papers should someone come around and identify his formula.

Alex looked at his watch, he waited as if he anticipated fast results... however, something else came up, a rather odd tingling sensation all across his body. A smile crossed his face as he witness that...
1112.title: He experiments with chemicals that enable him t...

choices: He was experiencing another tingling sensation...
A friend of his showed up at his house
11122.content:
...His pants began to feel constricting. Alex could see a bulge slowly, but steadily, getting bigger. Wanted some relief and to see the results, Alex unbuckled his pants and sagged it a little bit. The bulge was suddenly bigger as his growing penis had more space to move in his boxers.

The fabric stretched and teared as his soft penis reached a size that he could only have been possible when he was erect before. Knowing this, his blood began filling the veins of his penis, seemingly to speed up the growth process. Reaching a semi-hardened state, Alex reached into his boxers and grabbed his dick with one hand. Although he could wrap his entire grip around it, it was increasingly becoming difficult to do so. He pulled it out above his boxers, letting it hang out. He stared at it with disbelief as he shook it around a bit, sticking out like a pole.

Then, the tingling sensation he felt before grew stronger. Alex didn't think twice of it as he tried to get a point of reference to measure his now fully erect penis. It had to have been as long as his fore-arm and hands, and as wide as the widest point of his fore-arm. The experimental potion was much more potent than he thought.

Suddenly, his entire clothing felt tighter on him. He was so focused on his penis and its growth, that he didn't noticed he was actually growing everywhere.

Alex could feel his boxer and pants getting tighter on his legs. They were the first to go as Alex finally realized what was happening. At first, it was a surprise to him, but he quickly accepted it. He looked down at his shirt, which was bursting as his shoulders and pecs expanded. He raised his arms to flex, which tore the sleeves of his shirt.

He looked up at the ceiling and raised his arms to touch the ceiling. He couldn't yet, but the gap was getting smaller by the second. Soon, his finger tips were touching the nine foot ceiling, then the palm of his hands, and soon his head. At that moment, Alex's growth spurt slowly tailed off.

Alex fell to his knees, a moment of confusion over-taking him. He looked around his surroundings and everything looked so much smaller to him now. Then he looked at his penis, the thing that he wanted to grow so much. Still in a fully-erect state, it pointed upwards and away from the ground. This was so much more than Alex wanted....but he was actually fine with this. In fact, he was expecting more from the potion he drank.

Alex got up, in a slight 'hump' to avoid hitting the ceiling. He needed to see a mirror to see the results himself. He was heading out to his bathroom when-
11122.title: Experiment gone...right?

112.content:
Her name was Maranda.

Standing no less than 5'4 throughout her entire life, she always envied the bigger women that went attended her college.

With her slender waist, large hips, smooth legs, and drop dead gorgeous body, Maranda wanted to compliment such with a larger stature, but her growth stopped at a mere 5'4.

Most of the time, she would get help from people that were bigger than her, others mocked her short stature, others belittled her, and as a result, she would feel depressed. All this didn't fair better as she was receiving the same treatment during. her childhood. This would plague the mind of this beautiful young woman until today.

With long, black hair, brown hazel eyes, and a shapely and beautiful body, she wished for nothing more than to be larger for a day... no, forever.

Her birthday was coming up. Today she was going to be 20 years old. All she wanted was to be larger than anyone, everyone, she even entertained the thought of becoming a colossal giantess at most.

But in order to make herself feel better, she only needed to make a single wish, this wish to be bigger... MEGA. Maybe more.

... Maybe more.
112.title: She dream of a spurt.

1121.content:
Maranda woke up the next morning and quickly got out of bed, she somewhat felt happier than usual. She knew that her wish to become bigger had been fulfilled and wanted to try it right away.

She rushed downstairs and into the kitchen. Her mom was up eating breakfast but her father was already out working. "Hey mom guess what." she asked happily to her mother. "What is it honey?" her mother replied. "I can grow as big as I want." she smiled. "Maranda, did you smoke something?" ask her mother. "Yeah, but that's not the point, look..." Maranda then focused and began growing. "Been fun knowing you mom, but I'm off to do something even greater." Maranda's mom's eyes were wide open, as her daughter's head crashed through the ceiling, and quickly went crashing through the roof.

131.content:
Jake hated his life.

He was always being teased by his classmates for his size of 6'5" at the age of eleven. On his twelfth birthday, when he blew out his candles, Jake made a single wish: "I wish I was smaller." Nothing had happened, so he continued his party a touch disappointed. His wish was heard, however, it took The Wish Master to grant Jake his wish. The Wish Master was finally able to grant Jake's wish when he went to bed the very same night, and because Jake did not specify the size he wanted to become, The Wish Master had to decide for him, and settled on Jake becoming seven inches tall.

Jake woke up the next morning feeling a draft on his neither regions, freaking out when he saw how big his bed and the rest of his room both were. Just then his alarm started to go off. Throwing off the clovers, Jake ran to the end of the bed, but he didn't think that he could jump over to his bedside table where his alarm clock was. Just then there was a knock at the door and when he could not answer his door, the door would open itself. In would walk in his...

1312.content:
"Dude... it's six in the morning on a Saturday, turn off your alarm." The voice of Jake's brother was overheard from across the door.

This was bad, very bad indeed, for if Jake knew his brother at all, Jake knew that his brother was anything but patient. Before he knew it the door swung open.

“Alright you little pest, you better. . .” He grew silent as his eyes laid upon the abandoned bed. “Oh ha, ha, very funny twit. I know your hiding in your closet.” The titanic being walked over to the door at the opposite end of the room, but not before turning off the alarm; the very reason he had entered Jake’s domain to begin with. He reached across the door to Jake’s closet and slid open the sliding doors until they disappeared into the wall.

“Ah Ha.”

The burley teen staggered back as he found the hiding place of choice to be empty. “That sly dog snuck out of the house. He may just have hope yet.” He smiled contently in his boxer clad body, as he turned about face with the bed, and lowered his hindquarters onto the soft comforter. He swiveled around, placed his hands on the back of his head and let himself fall onto the cloud-like pillow. He rolled his head to the right saying: “I wonder what he would sneak out for. He-” Devin stopped mid-sentence, as he spied something nearby.
1312.title: devin the titan

132.content: Let's shrink Lindsey, an eighteen year old
132.title: Female

1321.content:
Lindsey is practically your every day eighteen year old. College student, enjoys the 'occasional' drink, and otherwise unremarkable in many ways. She has brown hair and eyes, the former of which reaches her waist when it isn't tied up into a ponytail. She's not tall for her age, neither is she short, at a somewhat average 5 foot 7. She watches anime, plays video games, reads manga, jogs to keep fit, studies sometimes, and likes to annoy her younger sisters, fifteen year old Jenny, and thirteen year old Chloe.

While they do usually get along, Lindsay can't help but tease her little sisters, simple because it's fun!

Her two places of residence are college campus, and at home with her parents, 41 year old Martha, and 45 year old Derek, when she's between semesters. She soes often wake up somewhere random though, due to a sporadic night of drinking. She usually wakes up at a friend's house, though!

Anyway, enough description; time for some plot.

One morning, Lindsay awakens to find herself shrunk down to a size of just five inches!

Where does it happen?
1321.title: Little Lindsey.

13212.content: When Lindsay noticed, she was tiny, but how tall

(Changing the size to five to keep consistency with the previous chapter)

With a grunt, Lindsay awoke, only to find herself buried in some sort of fabric. She flailed her way out of it to learn that it was her pyjamas, and that she'd shrunk down to a tiny size!

"What... the?" She muttered to no one, glancing around the enormous scale of the room. The walls were so far apart she could barely make out the details at her size, and her bed felt like it was about thirty feet up!

Amidst all of her panicking, she barely noticed when the door opened and ________ walked in.
132121.title: Five inches

choices: The height of her feet (3 inches)
1531.content:
You walk into your house after a day of work. Not professional work, just labor-like work. You're suppose to be living alone in a rented, torn apart apartment, but you took in a "guest" without permission. Her name is Aria, a 16 year old cat-like girl (of course furry) with a mixture of red and blue fur. You have no idea where she came from or who she actually is, but kicking her out is an option you don't consider.

"Hey Aria!" you yell. You wait for a second, then she lazily walks into the room yawning. "Uh... Yeah, whats up?" she says in her mid-yawn. "Are you still doing that chemistry stuff?" you ask.

"It's not chemistry." she replies angrily. "It's more like..."

"Magic?" you say laughing. "That... I guess you could use that." she replies.

You stop, you tried to make it a joke, but apparently she took it seriously. "Well, show me what it is then." you continue. She thinks for a second, then smiles, as if she had an idea. She takes you to her given room. There stood her bed, a closet, and a table, which has a few big and odd looking objects on it. "You're not building a bomb are you?" you laugh.

She rolls her eyes and sits by the table. "Come here for a second." she says. You do so, and stand in front of some black rock that looks, as if several things were just carelessly thrown onto it.

"What have you been doing?" you say laughing again. You reach out and touch it, but she slaps your hand away,

"Don't!" she yells.

"Woah! Okay... I..." you stop and look down at your hand. Your finger starts to change color somewhat.

"Crap!" she yells worried, "Okay... Uh... I think I can..."

Before she finishes, your hands start to lose blood, as they turn pale. Aria looks at you confused, as you do her. Because she... is growing! Or as your smart enough to know by now, you're shrinking... By the time she runs up to you, your eyes only meet her stomach, then soon her waist. Her hand grabs your shoulder for a second, then your blood slowly shoots back into your arms.

When it ends, you look towards the giantess standing in front of you.

(Sorry, I know most of you don't like long starting chapters...)

info.brief_description: An ideal tale of EPIC proportions. Whether BIG or... small.
info.description:
Make up your mind as you dive into any of your desired fantasies. I will recommend that you place your fantasies into the categories that I shall place below for all to enjoy. I will not interfere with any of your additions whether it involves: Shrinking, Growing, or Furry fantasies involved. (However, I will fix any nooks and minor errors for every post needed. After all, if you don't catch it, it's a good thing that the creator can edit your unseen mistakes per post.) Place in anything you want, as long as you don't go overboard with the content.

Thank you.

Post lengthy and post away. (Oh, no sudden jolts of growth that skyrocket your characters, until they reach 500-feet range *story-wise.)
